description: Two boys, aged 14 and 16, are arrested on suspicion of criminal damage and remain in custody.
title: Westfield Stratford: Teens arrested after seat thrown from height
title_page: Westfield Stratford: Teens arrested after seat thrown from height - BBC News
maintext:
Police have arrested two teenage boys after a video circulated online showed a heavy seat was thrown from the third floor of Stratford Westfield shopping centre, narrowly missing shoppers on the ground floor.
The 14-year-old boy and a 16-year-old boy were arrested on suspicion of criminal damage and remained in custody, the Met Police said.
Police were alerted to Saturday's incident after the video was published online showing the seat being launched, and a group of boys then running up the escalator.
Westfield said the case was being handled by the police when contacted by the BBC.
